DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the glycaemic control, weight change and hypoglycaemic effects in patients with type 2 diabetes with Levemir速 compared to Insulatard速 under normal clinical practice conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Patients Using Levemir速 or Insulatard速 as Start Insulin for Treatment of Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes failing on oral blood glucose lowering therapy, and requiring insulin therapy. Type 1 diabetes Previous use of insulin
